p: Isopropyl myristate, Tween 80, Span 80, and Pluronic copolymers (F127 and F68) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich. Other Pluronic copolymers (F88, F98, and F108) were kindly provided as a gift by BASF Corporation, NJ. Polyethylene glycol 400 (PEG 400) was purchased from TCI Chemical Trading Co., Ltd. All chemicals were used as received.
